string-array.item: The stairs have a property of changing their position in a mysterious manner. Try to get to the exit.\n\nWhat type of controls do you prefer?
Sometimes the way to the exit isn\'t so easy, as you think
For example, green key open green lock. But what about yellow lock?
Some characters are ready to exchange with you something useful
There are anything useful in the chests. But how to open them?
Some castles are patrolling by the ghosts. They are slightly stoopid and moves diagonally.\n\nBy the way, they no need stairs to move.
Who are building these castles?!
Even if the anvil is slightly touched, it will fall
As you can see, the anvil smashes everything it falls on
Sometimes you can get a double benefit with an anvil…
